Articles.Content:
I love it all! However, I do have a concern. Just went to 'Tanuki Chau's live squadcast, where she's playing "Buzz Aldrin's Race to Space". I ran into a wall of "F-Bombs". Needless to say I'm not impressed. I'm no saint but, I'm really turned off by any live stream blurting out profanities every five seconds. I do realize that SQUAD has no control of Twitch, but just the same, I'm a little dismayed.

I see your concern, but I think we can make a safe bet that there won't be a huge F-bomb scrawled over bop in the next update.

I love it all! However, I do have a concern. Just went to 'Tanuki Chau's live squadcast, where she's playing "Buzz Aldrin's Race to Space". I ran into a wall of "F-Bombs". Needless to say I'm not impressed. I'm no saint but, I'm really turned off by any live stream blurting out profanities every five seconds. I do realize that SQUAD has no control of Twitch, but just the same, I'm a little dismayed.

I'm sorry that my language does not align with your definition of social, moral, or proper acceptability. On the other hand I could just shut it off like I do for ksptv and say gee golly whiz and sound like a 1950's sitcom. The point of watching a twitch stream is you are watching a personality playing a game. While I respect and abide by Squads language requirements while streaming on their official channel, my own channel will contain swearing. I'm of the opinion that if language is offensive, then we have given it far too much power. I understand that's not how everyone feels. If you are unhappy with the level of 'colorful metaphors' I utilize while streaming, I know HOCGaming as well as ShimmytheJJ tend to be more family oriented stream if that is what you are looking for. Once again I'm sorry if my language is a concern to you, but I'm not going to change how I react when something goes horribly wrong.

I see your concern, but I think we can make a safe bet that there won't be a huge F-bomb scrawled over bop in the next update.

Yeah no. Most of it's silly geology humor (read really bad geology humor because I'm not a very good geologist...) WHAT HAVE I DONE?!

but seriously it's kid friendly and hopefully filled with some semi descent science. I spent a few weeks in the library studying up on planetary geology.

Cough cough Sarcasm Cough cough.

Cough cough Sarcasm Cough cough.

I know. I tend to reply with sarcasm with not sarcasm to highlight how awkward I can be. Thus setting myself up for moments to shine where I hyper explain something due to my sometimes annoying lack of humor. Thereby allowing my weakness (lack of sense of humor) to actually become funny....oh crap I went too far didn't I....
Yes, yes you did.

Yes, yes you did.

woopsie doodles?

Either way it's not finished yet...the biomes I mean. I read through a lot of comments about how people would like to see biomes (there is a lot of it) and I hope what I've come up with is something that people will enjoy. I just hope I don't disappoint. It's a big responsibility and I don't want to let people down.

People these days!

No respect...

Runs around arms flailing wildly while gibbering "I'msorryI'msorryI'msososorry" over and over again.

I read through a lot of comments about how people would like to see biomes (there is a lot of it) and I hope what I've come up with is something that people will enjoy.

As long as we don't get another Mun biome situation, I'm happy.

And something slightly more imaginative than Midlands, Highlands and Lowlands please. Those names, along with the combined area of each of them, has made me hate doing Science anywhere on the Mun that isn't a definitive landmark, like a crater.

When i think of a biome map i think of this map of mars. I dont know if this allays your fears or makes them worse. Either way im always up for tweaking in order to get the right combination of science and rage muahahaha

,

When i think of a biome map i think of this map of mars. http://www.wired.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/mars-map-inline1.jpg I dont know if this allays your fears or makes them worse. Either way im always up for tweaking in order to get the right combination of science and rage muahahaha

Something like that should be good. Duna is pretty close to Mars, so there's a lot of info to go on.

Some of the other ones are a little harder, like Eve, which is somewhere between Titan and Venus, (though some reasonable speculations can be made. I'm tempted to post my ideas, but some might be spoilers for the next instalment of OeE/COM) or the many small rocky bodies with little distinctive features.

Have the Devs given you a lot of background info per planet?

I've been finding the information gleaned from the forums and other places to be of tremendous use.

As a base get something that might be similar to stock(as a place holder), then take it as you feel it should be, don't let anyone intimidate you. any quirks will someday be considered a fun challenge anyway..

Everyone seems to be condescending these days if things aren't as good as they "should" be even though they are perfectly fine... Don't let that get in the way of any foresight you have..

This will be happening...as much fan input as possible is basically what I'm going for. This is all of your game, I'm just lucky enough to be a part of making it into a reality.

You asked...

Re-pass over the current biomes to remove those little "tundra" biome dots from around KSC (I assume they're all over).

If they'll let you, tiny biomes around each anomaly would be pretty awesome.

You asked...

Re-pass over the current biomes to remove those little "tundra" biome dots from around KSC (I assume they're all over).

If they'll let you, tiny biomes around each anomaly would be pretty awesome.

Oh hey. I saw your yt video with the asteroid plane. Nicely done! To answer your question due to time constraints (full time job, personal and family issues the whole spectrum) i realized i was going to have to do the biomes in iterations. Every planet now has biomes. Will some of them change and get tweaked? Yes. Basicslly im taking the approach of here is my work what do you think? I take your feedback and attempt to improve them. So when you see the biomes dont assume this is the end all be all In my notebook ive written down pretty much every suggestion ive read about how people want biomes. Ive then gone through ad tried to determine the level of difficulty implementing would be and whether there is a lot of added value to gameplay by implementing the feature. Then i go to my many....Many alt accounts all over the interwebs and figure out whether you guys like the way ive implemented a feature without (hopefully) you guys knowing its me.

You asked...

Re-pass over the current biomes to remove those little "tundra" biome dots from around KSC (I assume they're all over).

If they'll let you, tiny biomes around each anomaly would be pretty awesome.

These out-of-place biomes are present at many of the borders between different biomes. They aren't intentional, they are just a side-effect of stretching a very small biome map over the entire surface, which causes some blending of the colors used to identify biomes. There was some talk of trying to work around this in the custom biomes thread, but Squad will probably have to do something to fix it.
I would like to second the request for anomalies to have a tiny biome connected with them.

I would like to second the request for anomalies to have a tiny biome connected with them.

Please know that when the new biomes come out, that is not the end of it. Please trust that what you see in this version will not be the final version of the biome maps

I would like to second the request for anomalies to have a tiny biome connected with them.

And can we have Max's birthday "candle" please?

I mean this respectfully, but we might have the biome maps you make for several versions. Please try to make them as close to a final product as you can, the time for half-done placeholder features is drawing to a close.

I mean this respectfully, but we might have the biome maps you make for several versions. Please try to make them as close to a final product as you can, the time for half-done placeholder features is drawing to a close.

I understand please note that I don't believe they are bad. I just want to make sure that when I say I want perfection I'm not saying that while blowing hot air. I want the biomes to be what I feel is 100%.
